name: Ring of Protection
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's defense.
looks: The ring is made of silver with a simple design and a small gemstone embedded in the center.

special_effects.shielding: Increases the wearer's resistance to damage.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can restore health and vitality.
looks: The staff has a wooden shaft with intricate carvings depicting healing symbols. At the top of the staff is a crystal orb that emits a soft, healing glow.

special_effects.healing_wave: Casts a wave of healing energy, restoring health to nearby allies.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that enhances healing abilities.
looks: The staff is made of golden wood and adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. It glows softly with a warm, healing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates an aura that heals all nearby allies over time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Axe of Frost
description: A mighty axe that radiates cold energy.
looks: The axe has a massive, double-headed blade made of ice. The handle is made of sturdy wood and is adorned with frost runes.

special_effects.freeze: Has a chance to freeze enemies on hit, slowing them down.
